ğŸš€ Discover the latest enhancements in Microsoft Flight Simulator.This week not to many new items. The number of developers jumping onto the MSFS 2024 train is increasing which means more things being added. This week several airports from around the world are added including: Budapest Airport, Propriano Tavaria Airport, Lille Lesquin Airport and multiple other ones. Besides this other scenery enhancement packages have been added from multiple vendords. Join as we explore these breathtaking additions and see how they elevate your flight simulation experience. Do not miss out on the latest updates and improvements.
